_meta.source: Researched from Hawaii tourism, Maui visitor bureau, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Kahului, Haleakala, Lahaina, and beach areas

transit_routes.name: Rental Car
transit_routes.note: Best way to explore Maui. Airport rentals near port. Book ahead for cruise days.

transit_routes.name: Ship Excursions
transit_routes.note: Most convenient for Haleakala. Guided tours include transport and commentary.

featured_experiences.name: Haleakala Sunrise/Visit
featured_experiences.note: 2+ hour drive. Sunrise requires separate reservation. Bring warm layers - it's cold up there!

featured_experiences.name: Iao Valley
featured_experiences.note: Short drive from Kahului. Easy walks. Good option if limited time.

featured_experiences.name: Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: World-class beaches but require transport from Kahului port area.
